OOP! Let's see what happend

There are a few reason you could have ended up here:

  1. Page redirect or not found: You found an old link, we did a revamp and some urls changed our team is working on that.
  2. Retired: SEO services have been has been tabled to focue of accessibility. Maybe we will bring it back in time.
  3. True 404: Grimlems got in the system and Something is wrong and we would like to know.

Always Remember

Automated testing does not replace manual testing. Only a human can determine if a website is ada compliant.
The combination of a Certifed A11y developer and an A11y Platforme will set your team and project apart form others.

Join the Inclusive Web Movement Today!

Are you ready to make the internet a more inclusive and accessible place for everyone? Join us in our mission to create a web that leaves no one behind. Explore our services, become ADA compliant, and advocate for a more inclusive digital world.

Why Act Now?

  • Ensure your website complies with accessibility standards.
  • Reach a broader audience and potential customers.
  • Make a positive impact on the lives of people with disabilities.
  • Stay ahead of accessibility regulations and legal requirements.

Miasion Statement

At Kaffeinated Kodemonkey, our mission is to make the digital world more inclusive by ensuring every website and app we touch is accessible to all. We help businesses achieve ADA compliance while nurturing the next generation of A11y Developers and SMEs through hands-on mentorship, equipping them with the skills to lead in digital accessibility and shape a future where inclusivity is at the core of every digital experience.
